PluginData.Author: dude
PluginData.Tooltip: Decide what kinds of chat messages you want to see.
PluginData.Description: Block chat messsages from specific players or hide chat messages by type (global/faction/whisper). /mute [player name] - blocks chat messages from a player. /unmute [player name] - unblocks players messages. /cfconfig - open configuration window to set visibility for a specific chat channel.
